aboutBrand.title: About the brand
aboutBrand.text:
Nutva Pharm is a modern brand created for a healthy lifestyle, producing natural and effective bioactive supplements.
Our main goal is to support human health, strengthen immunity, and provide solutions that benefit the body without harm.
In 2020, Nutva Pharm began to be recognized in the markets of Uzbekistan, Central Asia, and Russia through its first product, Nutva Complex. Having initially studied the local market, we created products based on special compositions tailored to the needs of customers.
Today, the Nutva Pharm range includes separate product lines for children, women, men, and seniors. Each product is developed with a thorough scientific approach, environmentally friendly raw materials, and the best traditions of folk medicine.
Nutva Pharm is not just a bioactive supplement ‚Äî it is a philosophy of healthy living in harmony with nature and science.

1.3: Take 2 capsules in the evening, 30 minutes after a meal. The product is recommended to be taken in long-term courses for 3-6 months.

1.1: A natural anti-parasitic complex for children. Helps combat worms, toxins, and skin issues.

1.title: Helminths (Worms):
1.1: Ascaris ‚Äî multiplies in the intestines, causes cough and bronchitis, high risk of reinfection due to a full life cycle.
1.2: Tapeworm ‚Äî can live in the intestines for up to 30 years, migrates through the body, dangerous to the brain and heart.
1.3: Giardia ‚Äî transmitted via drinking water, unwashed vegetables, and contact. Resides in the small intestine.
1.4: Pinworms ‚Äî cause itching in the anal area, insomnia, and reinfection due to cyclical egg-laying.
1.5: Dwarf tapeworm ‚Äî very small, lives in the intestines, increases the risk of autoinvasion.

2.title: Prevention and Diagnosis:
2.1: Prevention: hygiene, trimming children's nails, consuming washed fruits and vegetables.
2.2: Diagnosis and treatment: doctor examination, egg detection in stool, antiparasitic therapy if necessary.

Take 2 capsules in the morning, 30 minutes before meals. The product is recommended for long-term courses of 3-6 months.

‚öïÔ∏è For men's health:
‚Ä¢ Prostatitis, urethritis, prostate adenoma - urinary difficulties, decreased potency.
‚Ä¢ Varicocele, erectile dysfunction - reduced sperm quality, risk of infertility.
‚Ä¢ Balanitis, epididymitis, orchitis - infections and inflammation of the reproductive system.

üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Solution: The complex can be used for addressing complex inflammatory conditions and hormonal imbalances.

üß† Nervous system and stress: regular intake supports overall energy, testosterone levels, sperm motility, and mental stability.

additional.title: Additional:
additional.1: Effectively helps with the following diseases:
additional.2: Spinal hernia - disruption of the integrity of the outer shell of the intervertebral disc;
additional.3: Coxarthrosis - erosion of the hip joint;
additional.4: Gonarthrosis - chronic degenerative disease of the knee joint;

complex.title: Effectively helps with the following conditions:
complex.1: Coxarthrosis - degeneration of the hip joint, causing pain while walking and limited mobility;
complex.2: Gonarthrosis - degeneration of the knee joint, characterized by pain, swelling, and difficulty bending;
complex.3: Osteochondrosis - degeneration of spinal discs, accompanied by pain and stiffness in the lower back, neck, or back;
complex.4: Herniated disc - protrusion of an intervertebral disc, compressing nerves and causing pain and numbness in limbs;
complex.5: Polyarthritis - inflammation of multiple joints, with swelling, stiffness, and pain during movement.

gelminKids.title: Effectively helps with the following conditions:
gelminKids.1: Pinworms (Enterobiasis) - the most common type of worm, especially in children. Symptoms include nighttime itching around the anus, restlessness, and loss of appetite. Highly contagious.
gelminKids.2: Roundworms (Ascariasis) - medium-sized white roundworms. Symptoms: abdominal pain, appetite loss, nausea, occasional cough, allergic rashes.
gelminKids.3: Giardiasis (Giardia) - microscopic parasites living in the intestines. Caused by dirty water or unwashed fruits/vegetables. Symptoms: diarrhea, nausea, bloating, fatigue.
gelminKids.4: Toxocariasis (Toxocara) - microscopic parasites transmitted from dogs or cats. They migrate through the human body. Symptoms: severe allergic reactions, fever, damage to eyes and internal organs.
gelminKids.5: Tapeworms - long, ribbon-like worms transmitted through undercooked meat. Symptoms: abdominal pain, weight loss, dizziness, worm segments in stool. Risks include nutrient deficiency, anemia, and weakness.

complexExtra.title: Effectively helps with the following conditions:
complexExtra.1: Hepatosis - fat accumulation in liver cells (fatty liver). Often caused by poor diet, sedentary lifestyle, and obesity. Liver function declines.
complexExtra.2: Hepatitis - liver inflammation. May be viral (A, B, C...) or toxic (due to medications or alcohol). Symptoms: fatigue, yellowing of the skin, weight loss.
complexExtra.3: Cholecystitis - inflammation of the gallbladder. Often due to gallstones or infection. Symptoms include heaviness, pain, and nausea.
complexExtra.4: Gastritis - inflammation of the stomach lining. Causes: stress, overeating. Symptoms: pain or a feeling of heaviness.
complexExtra.5: Pancreatitis - inflammation of the pancreas. Causes: fatty foods, alcohol, gallstones. Symptoms: severe abdominal pain, digestive problems.
complexExtra.6: Constipation - infrequent, hard stool. Causes: low water intake, sedentary lifestyle, lack of vitamins. Leads to discomfort, bloating, and insomnia.
complexExtra.7: Bowel dysfunction - diarrhea, bloating, pain, constipation. Causes: stress, infection, or poor diet.

fertiliaWomen.title: Effective for the following conditions:
fertiliaWomen.1: Vaginitis - Inflammation of the vaginal wall. Usually caused by infection or hormonal changes. Symptoms: discharge, itching, burning.
fertiliaWomen.2: Vulvitis - Inflammation of the external genitalia (labia). Common in children and menopausal women. Symptoms: itching, redness, pain.
fertiliaWomen.3: Cervicitis - Inflammation of the cervix. Often caused by sexually transmitted infections.
fertiliaWomen.4: Endometritis - Inflammation of the inner lining of the uterus (endometrium). Can occur due to childbirth, abortion, or infection.
fertiliaWomen.5: Adnexitis - Inflammation of the uterus appendages (ovaries and fallopian tubes). Comes with severe pain and fever.
fertiliaWomen.6: Bartholinitis - Inflammation of the Bartholin glands. Causes a painful lump near the vaginal opening.
fertiliaWomen.7: Salpingitis - Inflammation of the fallopian tubes. Usually results from STIs. Can cause discomfort, pain, and infertility.
fertiliaWomen.8: Ovarian inflammation - Often part of adnexitis. Ovaries become swollen, causing pain and menstrual disorders.
fertiliaWomen.9: Uterine fibroids - Benign tumors forming in the uterine wall. Sometimes cause pain and bleeding.
fertiliaWomen.10: Cyst - Fluid-filled sac. Common in ovaries and related to hormonal changes.
fertiliaWomen.11: Polycystic ovary syndrome - Hormonal imbalance leads to many ovarian cysts. Irregular periods, acne, and excessive hair growth are common.
fertiliaWomen.12: Follicular cyst - Forms during egg maturation. Often resolves on its own.
fertiliaWomen.13: Functional cyst - Simple ovarian cysts related to ovarian function. Caused by hormonal imbalance.
fertiliaWomen.14: Infectious diseases - Bacterial, viral, or fungal infections affecting internal reproductive organs.

virisMen.title: Effective for the following conditions:
virisMen.1: Cystitis - Inflammation of the bladder. Although more common in women, men may also experience painful and frequent urination.
virisMen.2: Prostatitis - Inflammation of the prostate gland. Causes pain, urination difficulties, and sexual weakness.
virisMen.3: Urethritis - Inflammation of the urethra. Usually caused by infections. Symptoms include itching and burning.
virisMen.4: Balanoposthitis - Inflammation of the glans and foreskin. Often due to poor hygiene or infection.
virisMen.5: Balanitis - Inflammation of the glans penis only. Symptoms: pain, redness, and discharge.
virisMen.6: Epididymitis - Inflammation of the epididymis. Comes with painful swelling, fever, and risk of infertility.
virisMen.7: Orchitis - Inflammation of the testicles. Often linked to viral infections, especially mumps.
virisMen.8: Prostate adenoma - Benign tumor of the prostate gland. In older men, causes urination problems and incomplete bladder emptying.
virisMen.9: Varicocele - Enlargement of the veins in the scrotum. A leading cause of male infertility.
virisMen.10: Male infertility - Can be due to hormone deficiencies, low sperm quality, or infections.
virisMen.11: Erectile dysfunction - Difficulty initiating or maintaining an erection. Commonly due to poor blood flow, stress, or hormonal imbalance.

accordionContent.1:
All our products are formulated with plant extracts, essential minerals, and beneficial vitamins.
We never use artificial dyes, antibiotics, or preservatives.
accordionContent.2: Thousands of people throughout our country have recovered their health with Nutva. Their stories are our pride and we're going to post them on our YouTube channel.
accordionContent.3: Nutva products are developed by experienced professionals and recommended by doctors. Our clients are under constant medical supervision and free inter-regional examinations are organized.
accordionContent.4: Our products meet international quality standards. The packaging is clear and easy to use.

title.2: Does it contain chemicals or hormones?
title.4: How is it taken? What‚Äôs the dosage?
title.5: How many months should it be taken?
title.6: When will the results be noticeable?
title.8: Is additional treatment or medication needed?
title.9: Can pregnant or breastfeeding women take it?

content.1: This product is used for joint and bone-related conditions.
content.2: No. It contains only natural herbal extracts, with no hormones or chemical substances.
content.3: It is produced in Uzbekistan in accordance with international ISO standards.
content.4: Take 1 capsule once a day for 10 days. Then continue with 2 capsules daily after meals with water. One box contains 60 capsules - enough for 1 month.
content.5: Depends on the condition. Usually, a 12-month course is recommended. For chronic illnesses, a longer duration may be needed.
content.6: Results vary by individual. However, noticeable relief is often experienced within 6 months.
content.7: Absolutely. It is especially beneficial for elderly people and is widely used by those of retirement age.
content.8: In most cases, Nutva is sufficient. For severe cases, additional treatment may be recommended after consulting a doctor.
content.9: Not suitable during pregnancy. It can be taken while breastfeeding.
content.10: Available on Telegram: https://t.me/nutvauz, via short number üìû 1294 (free), or online via Uzum Market.
